snippet.title: Not For Broadcast — Release Date Teaser
snippet.description:
Not For Broadcast releases on Steam, GOG and Epic Games Store on January 25th!
Check the game out now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147550/Not_For_Broadcast/
https://www.gog.com/ru/game/not_for_broadcast

Not For Broadcast is an immersive, high-pressure propaganda TV simulator acclaimed by players from around the world. Coming out of early access, the game is set in an alternate 1980s Britain where a radical government rises to rule with an iron fist and snarky rhetoric. Television is used as a brainwashing tool and that is exactly where you come in, mate. 

Follow the developers on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/notgamesuk
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/notgamesuk
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/notgamesuk

Join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/notforbroadcast
